DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate clinical radiographic outcome patient previously undergone tibiotalar arthrodesis use anterior approach blade-plate fixation tibiotalar arthritis secondary injury articular surface distal tibia .
DOC.brief_title: Anterior Tibiotalar Arthrodesis With Blade Plate Fixation
DOC.criteria: All patient undergone anterior ankle arthrodesis blade plate construct , perform single surgeon , January 2003 July 2011 University Utah Primary Childrens Medical Center ( PCMC ) eligible inclusion . Any patient 18 year age old eligible study .
